1.0.name: wordpress/playgamelah-embedder
1.0.description:
Playgamelah Embedder is a plugin to help integrate playgamelah games with your blog. Play game lah is a website that allows you to play free online games

Shortcode to use: [playgamelah game="" width="" height=""]

If the URL of the game page is: http://playgamelah.com/flash-arcade-game.php?gameid=13954&gamename=Happy%20Tree%20Friends%20Fire%20Escape

You copy the strings after "gamename=": Happy%20Tree%20Friends%20Fire%20Escape

Use the shortcode: *[playgamelah game="Happy%20Tree%20Friends%20Fire%20Escape"]

To customize the width: *[playgamelah game="Happy%20Tree%20Friends%20Fire%20Escape" width="450"]

To customize the height: *[playgamelah game="Happy%20Tree%20Friends%20Fire%20Escape" width="450" height="350"]
